# Fathom: Dynamic Data Software

}}
Fathom Dynamic Data Software is software for learning and teaching statistics, at the high school and introductory college level.
Reviews
*[http://www.techlearning.com/news/0002/awards-of-excellence-2005/64954 Technology & Learning Award of Excellence]
*[http://www.macworld.com/article/42482/2005/02/fathom.html MacWorld 2005 Review]
*[http://www.eclectichomeschool.org/reviews/individual_review2.asp?revid=1730 EHO Review]
